text: Flavigny-le-Grand-et-Beaurain is a commune. It is in the Hauts-de-France region in the Aisne department in the north of France. in 2012, 480 people lived there. In the 19th century, it had two mills that made wool and one for weaving. Category:Communes in Aisne
title: Flavigny-le-Grand-et-Beaurain
